of_P:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `simplicial_object.at -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `simplicial_object.at -/
/-- This lemma expresses the vanishing of
`(P q).f (n+1) ≫ X.δ k : X _[n+1] ⟶ X _[n]` when `k≠0` and `k≥n-q+2` -/
theorem of_P :
    ∀ q n : ℕ,
      higher_faces_vanish q
        ((P q).f (n + 1) : «expr ⟶ » (simplicial_object.at X (n + 1)) (simplicial_object.at X (n + 1)))
  | 0 => fun n j hj₁ => by
    exfalso
    have hj₂ := Fin.is_lt j
    linarith
  | q + 1 => fun n => by
    unfold P
    exact (of_P q n).induction
#align of_P of_P
map_Q:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `alternating_face_map_complex -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⥤ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `alternating_face_map_complex -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `alternating_face_map_complex -/
theorem map_Q {D : Type _} [Category D] [preadditive D] (G : «expr ⥤ » C D) [G.additive] (X : simplicial_object C)
    (q n : ℕ) :
    G.map ((Q q : «expr ⟶ » (alternating_face_map_complex X) _).f n) =
      (Q q : «expr ⟶ » (alternating_face_map_complex (((whiskering C D).obj G).obj X)) _).f n :=
  by
  rw [← add_right_inj (G.map ((P q : «expr ⟶ » (alternating_face_map_complex X) _).f n)), ← G.map_add, map_P G X q n,
    P_add_Q_f, P_add_Q_f]
  apply G.map_id
#align map_Q map_Q
map_P:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⥤ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `alternating_face_map_complex -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `alternating_face_map_complex -/
theorem map_P {D : Type _} [Category D] [preadditive D] (G : «expr ⥤ » C D) [G.additive] (X : simplicial_object C)
    (q n : ℕ) :
    G.map ((P q : «expr ⟶ » (alternating_face_map_complex X) _).f n) =
      (P q : «expr ⟶ » (alternating_face_map_complex (((whiskering C D).obj G).obj X)) _).f n :=
  by
  induction' q with q hq
  · unfold P
    apply G.map_id
  · unfold P
    simp only [comp_add, homological_complex.comp_f, homological_complex.add_f_apply, comp_id, functor.map_add,
      functor.map_comp, hq, map_Hσ]
#align map_P map_P
comp_P_eq_self_iff:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `simplicial_object.at -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
theorem comp_P_eq_self_iff {Y : C} {n q : ℕ} {φ : «expr ⟶ » Y (simplicial_object.at X (n + 1))} :
    «expr ≫ » φ ((P q).f (n + 1)) = φ ↔ higher_faces_vanish q φ :=
  by
  constructor
  · intro hφ
    rw [← hφ]
    apply higher_faces_vanish.of_comp
    apply higher_faces_vanish.of_P
  · exact higher_faces_vanish.comp_P_eq_self
#align comp_P_eq_self_iff comp_P_eq_self_iff
comp_P_eq_self:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `simplicial_object.at -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
@[reassoc.1]
theorem comp_P_eq_self {Y : C} {n q : ℕ} {φ : «expr ⟶ » Y (simplicial_object.at X (n + 1))}
    (v : higher_faces_vanish q φ) : «expr ≫ » φ ((P q).f (n + 1)) = φ :=
  by
  induction' q with q hq
  · unfold P
    apply comp_id
  · unfold P
    simp only [comp_add, homological_complex.comp_f, homological_complex.add_f_apply, comp_id, ← assoc, hq v.of_succ,
      add_right_eq_self]
    by_cases hqn : n < q
    · exact v.of_succ.comp_Hσ_eq_zero hqn
    · cases' nat.le.dest (not_lt.mp hqn) with a ha
      have hnaq : n = a + q := by linarith
      simp only [v.of_succ.comp_Hσ_eq hnaq, neg_eq_zero, ← assoc]
      have eq := v ⟨a, by linarith⟩ (by simp only [hnaq, Fin.val_mk, nat.succ_eq_add_one, add_assoc])
      simp only [Fin.succ_mk] at eq
      simp only [eq, zero_comp]
#align comp_P_eq_self comp_P_eq_self
Q_idem:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `alternating_face_map_complex -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `alternating_face_map_complex -/
@[simp, reassoc.1]
theorem Q_idem (q : ℕ) :
    «expr ≫ » (Q q : «expr ⟶ » (alternating_face_map_complex X) (alternating_face_map_complex X)) (Q q) = Q q :=
  by
  ext n
  exact Q_f_idem q n
#align Q_idem Q_idem
Q_f_naturality:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `simplex_category.mk -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `simplex_category.mk -/
@[simp, reassoc.1]
theorem Q_f_naturality (q n : ℕ) {X Y : simplicial_object C} (f : «expr ⟶ » X Y) :
    «expr ≫ » (f.app (op (simplex_category.mk n))) ((Q q).f n) =
      «expr ≫ » ((Q q).f n) (f.app (op (simplex_category.mk n))) :=
  by
  simp only [Q, homological_complex.sub_f_apply, homological_complex.id_f, comp_sub, P_f_naturality, sub_comp,
    sub_left_inj]
  dsimp
  simp only [comp_id, id_comp]
#align Q_f_naturality Q_f_naturality
Q_f_idem:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `simplicial_object.at -/
@[simp, reassoc.1]
theorem Q_f_idem (q n : ℕ) : «expr ≫ » ((Q q).f n : «expr ⟶ » (simplicial_object.at X n) _) ((Q q).f n) = (Q q).f n :=
  idem_of_id_sub_idem _ (P_f_idem q n)
#align Q_f_idem Q_f_idem
Q_f_0_eq:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `simplicial_object.at -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `simplicial_object.at -/
/-- All the `Q q` coincide with `0` in degree 0. -/
@[simp]
theorem Q_f_0_eq (q : ℕ) : ((Q q).f 0 : «expr ⟶ » (simplicial_object.at X 0) (simplicial_object.at X 0)) = 0 := by
  simp only [homological_complex.sub_f_apply, homological_complex.id_f, Q, P_f_0_eq, sub_self]
#align Q_f_0_eq Q_f_0_eq
Q_eq_zero:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `alternating_face_map_complex -/
@[simp]
theorem Q_eq_zero : (Q 0 : «expr ⟶ » (alternating_face_map_complex X) _) = 0 :=
  sub_self _
#align Q_eq_zero Q_eq_zero
Q_eq:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `alternating_face_map_complex -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
theorem Q_eq (q : ℕ) : (Q (q + 1) : «expr ⟶ » (alternating_face_map_complex X) _) = Q q - «expr ≫ » (P q) (Hσ q) :=
  by
  unfold Q P
  simp only [comp_add, comp_id]
  abel
#align Q_eq Q_eq
P_idem:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `alternating_face_map_complex -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `alternating_face_map_complex -/
@[simp, reassoc.1]
theorem P_idem (q : ℕ) :
    «expr ≫ » (P q : «expr ⟶ » (alternating_face_map_complex X) (alternating_face_map_complex X)) (P q) = P q :=
  by
  ext n
  exact P_f_idem q n
#align P_idem P_idem
P_f_naturality:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `simplex_category.mk -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `simplex_category.mk -/
@[simp, reassoc.1]
theorem P_f_naturality (q n : ℕ) {X Y : simplicial_object C} (f : «expr ⟶ » X Y) :
    «expr ≫ » (f.app (op (simplex_category.mk n))) ((P q).f n) =
      «expr ≫ » ((P q).f n) (f.app (op (simplex_category.mk n))) :=
  homological_complex.congr_hom ((nat_trans_P q).naturality f) n
#align P_f_naturality P_f_naturality
P_f_idem:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `simplicial_object.at -/
@[simp, reassoc.1]
theorem P_f_idem (q n : ℕ) : «expr ≫ » ((P q).f n : «expr ⟶ » (simplicial_object.at X n) _) ((P q).f n) = (P q).f n :=
  by
  cases n
  · rw [P_f_0_eq q, comp_id]
  · exact (higher_faces_vanish.of_P q n).comp_P_eq_self
#align P_f_idem P_f_idem
P_f_0_eq:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `simplicial_object.at -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `simplicial_object.at -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr𝟙» -/

/-- All the `P q` coincide with `𝟙 _` in degree 0. -/
@[simp]
theorem P_f_0_eq (q : ℕ) :
    ((P q).f 0 : «expr ⟶ » (simplicial_object.at X 0) (simplicial_object.at X 0)) = («expr𝟙») _ :=
  by
  induction' q with q hq
  · rfl
  · unfold P
    simp only [homological_complex.add_f_apply, homological_complex.comp_f, homological_complex.id_f, id_comp, hq,
      Hσ_eq_zero, add_zero]
#align P_f_0_eq P_f_0_eq
P_add_Q_f:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr𝟙» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `simplicial_object.at -/
theorem P_add_Q_f (q n : ℕ) : (P q).f n + (Q q).f n = («expr𝟙») (simplicial_object.at X n) :=
  homological_complex.congr_hom (P_add_Q q) n
#align P_add_Q_f P_add_Q_f
P_add_Q:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr𝟙» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `alternating_face_map_complex -/
theorem P_add_Q (q : ℕ) : P q + Q q = («expr𝟙») (alternating_face_map_complex X) :=
  by
  rw [Q]
  abel
#align P_add_Q P_add_Q
